scripts.ghpages-create: git checkout -B gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit
scripts.ghpages-commit: git add dist -f && git commit -m 'Deployment commit'
scripts.ghpages-push: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist main`:gh-pages --force
scripts.ghpages: npm run build && npm run ghpages-create && npm run ghpages-commit && npm run ghpages-push && npm run ghpages-finish
